description: Trivia game about animals and where they are found.

questions.question_text: Where can you find the Bengal Tiger? (3 answers)
In which country would you find the Komodo Dragon? (1 answer)
Where is the natural habitat of the Giant Panda? (1 answer)
Which countries are home to the African Elephant? (3 answers)
Where can you find the Red Kangaroo? (1 answer)
Which countries are home to the Amazon River Dolphin? (3 answers)
In which country can you find the Bald Eagle? (1 answer)
Where can you find the Tasmanian Devil? (1 answer)
In which country can you find the Lemur? (1 answer)
Where can you find the Jaguar? (3 answers)
